summary: Just a little perk boost to help get you going.
descriptionHtml:
Please endorse if you use this mod.

Please do not re-post this mod anywhere else, this is a Nexus exclusive.

Booster Shot 

Just a little perk boost to help get you going.  Here is the back story.  After narrowly escaping from the dragon you find yourself wondering around in the woods and an Elf finds you and gives you this scroll...   Ok, it really isn\'t a scroll, just a txt file.  

To use place the boostershot.txt in your Skyrim folder. The same folder as the TESV.exe is in.  

While in the game, you need to type the tilde key ~ on you keyboard... the squiggly line.  This opens the console.  
Next type [color=#0c0][b][u]bat boostershot[/u] [/b][/color]and hit enter.  
Then type the tilde key again to close console.

This adds perks to your tree.  If you don\'t want any of these you can edit the boostershot.txt file.  This isn\'t the whole tree, just a couple from each tree.

Here is whats added:

Light Armor
player.addperk 000be123 Increase armor rating for Light armor by 20%.
player.addperk 00079376 Increase armor rating for Light armor by 40%.

One-handed
player.addperk 000babe4 One-Handed weapons do 20% more damage.
player.addperk 00079343 One-Handed weapons do 40% more damage.

Smithing
player.addperk 000cb40d can create Steel armor and weapons at forges, and improve them twice as much.
player.addperk 0005218e You can improve magical weapons and armor.

Speech
player.addperk 000be128 Buying and selling prices are 10% better.
player.addperk 000c07ce Buying and selling prices are 15% better.

Archery
player.addperk 000babed Bows do 20% more damage.
player.addperk 0007934a Bows do 40% more damage.

Alchemy
player.addperk 000be127 Potions and poisons you make are 20% stronger.
player.addperk 000c07ca Potions and poisons you make are 40% stronger.

Block
player.addperk 000bccae Blocking is 20% more effective.
player.addperk 00079355 Blocking is 25% more effective.

Heavy Armor
player.addperk 000bcd2a Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 20%.
player.addperk 0007935e Increases armor rating for Heavy Armor by 40%.

Alteration 
player.addperk 000f2ca6 Cast Novice level Alteration spells for half magicka.
player.addperk 000153cd Dual casting an Alteration spell overcharges the effects into an even more powerful version.

Destruction
player.addperk 000f2ca8 Cast Novice level Destruction spells for half magicka.
player.addperk 000c44bf Cast Apprentice level Destruction spells for half magicka.

Lockpicking
player.addperk 000f392a Novice locks are much easier to pick.
player.addperk 000be125 Apprentice locks are much easier to pick.

Enchanting 
player.addperk 000bee97 New enchantments are 20% stronger.
player.addperk 000c367c New enchantments are 40% stronger.

Pickpocket
player.addperk 000be124 Pickpocketing bonus of 20%. Item weight and value reduce pickpocketing odds.
player.addperk 00018e6a Pickpocketing bonus of 40%. Item weight and value reduce pickpocketing odds.

Sneak 
player.addperk 000be126 You are 20% harder to detect when sneaking.
player.addperk 000c07c6 You are 25% harder to detect when sneaking.

Two-handed
player.addperk 000babe8 Two-Handed weapons do 20% more damage.
player.addperk 00079346 Two-Handed weapons do 40% more damage.

Illusion 
player.addperk 000f2ca9 Cast Novice level Illusion spells for half magicka.
player.addperk 000581e1 Illusion spells now work on higher level animals (+8 levels to the spell maximum).

Restoration 
player.addperk 000f2caa Cast Novice level Restoration spells for half magicka.
player.addperk 000c44c7 Cast Apprentice level Restoration spells for half magicka.

Conjuration
player.addperk 000f2ca7 Cast Novice level Conjuration spells for half magicka.
player.addperk 000c44bb Cast Apprentice level Conjuration spells for half magicka.
author: Waning Gibbous
